data.actual_result: Letters get cut off on the bottom
data.expected_result: Letters are not cut off on the bottom
data.short_description: Lowercase letters such as g, y, and p are cut off in member names in member settings on 90 zoom
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your zoom level to 90 - Go into member settings in a server you can view the member settings - Find a member that has a lowercase letter such as g, y, or p in their name - View the bottom part of those letters in the top name (the one that is their name on the server)
